sql_queries.sql_query: SELECT institution_type AS category, SUM(student_count) AS value, (SUM(student_count) * 100.0 / (SELECT SUM(student_count) FROM education_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2023)) AS percentage FROM education_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2023 GROUP BY institution_type ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT institution_type AS category, SUM(student_count) AS value FROM education_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE) = 2023 GROUP BY institution_type ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT institution_type AS category, SUM(student_count) AS value FROM education_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE) = 2023 GROUP BY institution_type ORDER BY value DESC;
